trans-unit.source: For RGB images, the algorithm uses the euclidean distance between pixels in color space.
trans-unit.target: 对于RGB图像,该算法使用颜色空间中像素之间的欧氏距离。

trans-unit.source: For RGBA images, the original alpha channel is removed.
trans-unit.target: 对于RGBA图像,原始的alpha通道被删除。

trans-unit.source: For a given size of (m) horizontal and vertical sides and a given (n) height or width of slanted sides octagon is generated. The slanted sides are 45 or 135 degrees to the horizontal axis and hence the widths and heights are equal.
trans-unit.target: 对于给定尺寸的(m)水平边和垂直边以及给定的(n)斜边的高度或宽度,生成八边形。斜边与水平轴成45或135度,因此宽度和高度相等。

trans-unit.source: For a n-level discrete wavelet transforms, one may wish to perform all shifts up to max_shifts = 2**n - 1. In practice, much of the benefit can often be realized with only a small number of shifts per axis.
trans-unit.target: 对于n级离散小波变换，可能希望执行所有移位，直到 max_shifts = 2**n - 1 。在实践中，很多好处通常可以通过每个轴仅进行少量移位来实现。

trans-unit.source: For a one-off solution, the simplest, surest route is to convert the video to a collection of sequentially-numbered image files, often called an image sequence. Then the images files can be read into an ImageCollection by skimage.io.imread_collection. Converting the video to frames can be done easily in ImageJ, a cross-platform, GUI-based program from the bio-imaging community, or FFmpeg, a powerful command-line utility for manipulating video files.
trans-unit.target: 对于一次性解决方案，最简单，最可靠的方法是将视频转换为顺序编号的图像文件的集合，通常称为图像序列。然后将图像文件可以被读入 ImageCollection 通过 skimage.io.imread_collection 。将视频转换为帧可以很容易地在ImageJ中完成，ImageJ是来自生物成像社区的跨平台，基于GUI的程序，或者是FFmpeg（用于处理视频文件的功能强大的命令行实用程序）。

trans-unit.source: For a one-off solution, the simplest, surest route is to convert the video to a collection of sequentially-numbered image files, often called an image sequence. Then the images files can be read into an ImageCollection by skimage.io.imread_collection. Converting the video to frames can be done easily in ImageJ, a cross-platform, GUI-based program from the bio-imaging community, or FFmpeg, a powerful command-line utility for manipulating video files.
trans-unit.target: 对于一次性解决方案，最简单，最可靠的方法是将视频转换为顺序编号的图像文件的集合，通常称为图像序列。然后将图像文件可以被读入 ImageCollection 通过 skimage.io.imread_collection 。将视频转换为帧可以很容易地在ImageJ中完成，ImageJ是来自生物成像社区的跨平台，基于GUI的程序，或者是FFmpeg（一种用于处理视频文件的强大命令行实用程序）。

trans-unit.source: For an array with rank greater than 1, some of the padding of later axes is calculated from padding of previous axes. This is easiest to think about with a rank 2 array where the corners of the padded array are calculated by using padded values from the first axis.
trans-unit.target: 对于一个等级大于1的数组,后面轴的一些填充是由前面轴的填充计算的。这对于一个等级为2的数组来说是最容易想到的,在这个数组中,填充数组的角是通过使用第一个轴的填充值来计算的。

trans-unit.target: 对于网格上的每个 (r, c) 坐标，即 (0, 0) ， (0, 1) 等，测试该点是否位于多边形内。

trans-unit.source: For each candidate:
trans-unit.target: 对于每个候选人:

trans-unit.source: For each descriptor in the first set this matcher finds the closest descriptor in the second set (and vice-versa in the case of enabled cross-checking).
trans-unit.target: 对于第一个集合中的每个描述符,这个匹配器会在第二个集合中找到最接近的描述符(在启用交叉检查的情况下,反之亦然)。

trans-unit.source: For each dimension, specifies the distance between two cells/voxels. If not given or None, the distance is assumed unit.
trans-unit.target: 对于每一个维度,指定两个单元格/单元格之间的距离。如果没有给定或无,则假定距离为单位。

trans-unit.source: For each homogeneous coordinate \(\mathbf{x} = [x, y, 1]^T\), its target position is calculated by multiplying with the given matrix, \(H\), to give \(H \mathbf{x}\):
trans-unit.target: 对于每一个同质坐标(mathbf{x}=[x,y,1]^T\),其目标位置通过与给定矩阵mathbf{x}相乘来计算,得到mathbf{x})。

trans-unit.source: For each keypoint, intensity comparisons are carried out for a specifically distributed number N of pixel-pairs resulting in a binary descriptor of length N. For binary descriptors the Hamming distance can be used for feature matching, which leads to lower computational cost in comparison to the L2 norm.
trans-unit.target: 对于每个关键点,对具体分布的N个像素对进行强度比较,从而得到一个长度为N的二元描述符。 对于二元描述符,可以使用汉明距离进行特征匹配,与L2规范相比,可以降低计算成本。

trans-unit.source: For each point the shortest distance to the circle is returned.
trans-unit.target: 对于每个点,都会返回到圆的最短距离。

trans-unit.source: For each point the shortest distance to the ellipse is returned.
trans-unit.target: 对于每个点,将返回到椭圆的最短距离。

trans-unit.source: For each point, the shortest (orthogonal) distance to the line is returned. It is obtained by projecting the data onto the line.
trans-unit.target: 对于每个点,返回到线的最短(正交)距离。它是通过将数据投影到线上获得的。

trans-unit.source: For each step along axis, the coordinate of the shortest path. If output_indexlist is True, then the path is returned as a list of n-d tuples that index into arr. If False, then the path is returned as an array listing the coordinates of the path along the non-axis dimensions for each step along the axis dimension. That is, p.shape == (arr.shape[axis], arr.ndim-1) except that p is squeezed before returning so if arr.ndim == 2, then p.shape == (arr.shape[axis],)
trans-unit.target: 对于沿 axis 每一步，最短路径的坐标。如果 output_indexlist 为True，则该路径将作为索引到 arr 的nd元组的列表返回。如果为False，则将路径作为数组返回，列出沿轴尺寸的每个步骤沿非轴尺寸的路径坐标。那是， p.shape == (arr.shape[axis], arr.ndim-1) 只是在返回之前挤压p，所以如果 arr.ndim == 2 ，则 p.shape == (arr.shape[axis],)

trans-unit.source: For example, let us consider a 3 dimensional array of size (100, 100, 100) of float64. This array takes about 8*100**3 Bytes for storage which is just 8 MB. If one decides to build a rolling view on this array with a window of (3, 3, 3) the hypothetical size of the rolling view (if one was to reshape the view for example) would be 8*(100-3+1)**3*3**3 which is about 203 MB! The scaling becomes even worse as the dimension of the input array becomes larger.
trans-unit.target: 例如，让我们考虑一个 float64 大小为（100，100，100）的3维数组。该阵列大约需要8 * 100 ** 3字节的存储空间，仅为8 MB。如果决定使用（3，3，3）窗口在此数组上构建滚动视图，则滚动视图的假设大小（例如，如果要重塑视图的形状）将为8 *（100-3 + 1 ）** 3 * 3 ** 3约为203 MB！随着输入数组的尺寸变大，缩放比例甚至会变差。

trans-unit.source: For files with multiple images, the images will be flattened into a list and added to the list of available images. In this case, load_func should accept the keyword argument img_num.
trans-unit.target: 对于包含多个图像的文件，图像将被展平到一个列表中并添加到可用图像列表中。在这种情况下， load_func 应该接受关键字参数 img_num 。

trans-unit.source: For gamma greater than 1, the histogram will shift towards left and the output image will be darker than the input image.
trans-unit.target: 伽玛值大于1时,直方图将向左移动,输出图像将比输入图像更暗。

trans-unit.source: For gamma less than 1, the histogram will shift towards right and the output image will be brighter than the input image.
trans-unit.target: 伽玛值小于1时,直方图将向右移动,输出图像将比输入图像更亮。

trans-unit.source: For integer images, the above equality holds to within one; for floating- point images, the equality holds to within the histogram bin-width.
trans-unit.target: 对于整数图像,上述平等性在1以内;对于浮点图像,平等性在直方图bin-width以内。

trans-unit.source: For integer typed images, this corresponds to the h-maxima with h=1. For float typed images, h is determined as the smallest difference between grey levels.
trans-unit.target: 对于整数类型的图像,这相当于h=1的h最大值。对于浮动类型的图像,h被确定为灰度级之间的最小差异。

trans-unit.source: For integer typed images, this corresponds to the h-minima with h=1. For float typed images, h is determined as the smallest difference between grey levels.
trans-unit.target: 对于整数类型的图像,这相当于h=1的h最小值。对于浮动类型的图像,h被确定为灰度级之间的最小差异。

trans-unit.source: For non-scalar properties not listed in OBJECT_COLUMNS, each element will appear in its own column, with the index of that element separated from the property name by this separator. For example, the inertia tensor of a 2D region will appear in four columns: inertia_tensor-0-0, inertia_tensor-0-1, inertia_tensor-1-0, and inertia_tensor-1-1 (where the separator is -).

trans-unit.source: Gabor filter is a linear filter with a Gaussian kernel which is modulated by a sinusoidal plane wave. Frequency and orientation representations of the Gabor filter are similar to those of the human visual system. Gabor filter banks are commonly used in computer vision and image processing. They are especially suitable for edge detection and texture classification.
trans-unit.target: Gabor滤波器是一种具有高斯核的线性滤波器,它由一个正弦平面波调制。Gabor滤波器的频率和方向表示与人类视觉系统相似。Gabor滤波器组常用于计算机视觉和图像处理中。它们特别适用于边缘检测和纹理分类。

trans-unit.source: Gabor kernel is a Gaussian kernel modulated by a complex harmonic function. Harmonic function consists of an imaginary sine function and a real cosine function. Spatial frequency is inversely proportional to the wavelength of the harmonic and to the standard deviation of a Gaussian kernel. The bandwidth is also inversely proportional to the standard deviation.
trans-unit.target: Gabor核是由复调谐函数调制的高斯核。谐波函数由一个虚正弦函数和一个实余弦函数组成。空间频率与谐波的波长和高斯核的标准差成反比。带宽也与标准差成反比。

trans-unit.source: Generating an image sequence has disadvantages: they can be large and unwieldy, and generating them can take some time. It is generally preferable to work directly with the original video file. For a more direct solution, we need to execute FFmpeg or LibAV from Python to read frames from the video. FFmpeg and LibAV are two large open-source projects that decode video from the sprawling variety of formats used in the wild. There are several ways to use them from Python. Each, unfortunately, has some disadvantages.
trans-unit.target: 生成图像序列有其缺点:它们可能很大,很笨重,而且生成它们可能需要一些时间。一般来说,最好是直接使用原始视频文件。对于更直接的解决方案,我们需要执行Python中的FFmpeg或LibAV来读取视频中的帧。FFmpeg和LibAV是两个大型的开源项目,它们从野外使用的各种格式中解码视频。有几种方法可以从Python中使用它们。不幸的是,每种方法都有一些缺点。

trans-unit.source: Given a labelled image and its corresponding RAG, show the nodes and edges of the RAG on the image with the specified colors. Edges are displayed between the centroid of the 2 adjacent regions in the image.
trans-unit.target: 给定一个标记的图像和它对应的RAG,用指定的颜色在图像上显示RAG的节点和边缘。边缘显示在图像中两个相邻区域的中心点之间。

trans-unit.source: Given an image and its initial segmentation, this method constructs the corresponding Region Adjacency Graph (RAG). Each node in the RAG represents a set of pixels within image with the same label in labels. The weight between two adjacent regions represents how similar or dissimilar two regions are depending on the mode parameter.
trans-unit.target: 给定图像及其初始分割，此方法将构造相应的区域邻接图（RAG）。在RAG的每个节点代表内的一组像素的 image 以相同的标号 labels 。两个相邻区域之间的权重表示取决于 mode 参数，两个区域的相似度或不相似度。

trans-unit.source: Given an image’s initial segmentation and its edge map this method constructs the corresponding Region Adjacency Graph (RAG). Each node in the RAG represents a set of pixels within the image with the same label in labels. The weight between two adjacent regions is the average value in edge_map along their boundary.
trans-unit.target: 给定图像的初始分割及其边缘图，此方法将构造相应的区域邻接图（RAG）。在RAG每个节点代表在相同标签的图像内的一组像素的 labels 。两个相邻区域之间的权重是 edge_map 中沿其边界的平均值。

trans-unit.source: Given an image’s labels and its RAG, output new labels by combining regions whose nodes are separated by a weight less than the given threshold.
trans-unit.target: 给定图像的标签及其RAG，通过组合节点的权重小于给定阈值的区域来输出新标签。

trans-unit.source: Given an image’s labels and its similarity RAG, recursively perform a 2-way normalized cut on it. All nodes belonging to a subgraph that cannot be cut further are assigned a unique label in the output.
trans-unit.target: 给定图像的标签及其相似性RAG，请对其进行递归2归一化切割。属于子图且无法进一步切割的所有节点在输出中分配了唯一的标签。

trans-unit.source: Given an n-d costs array, this class can be used to find the minimum-cost path through that array from any set of points to any other set of points. Basic usage is to initialize the class and call find_costs() with a one or more starting indices (and an optional list of end indices). After that, call traceback() one or more times to find the path from any given end-position to the closest starting index. New paths through the same costs array can be found by calling find_costs() repeatedly.
trans-unit.target: 给定一个n-d的成本数组,这个类可以用来寻找从任何一组点到其他任何一组点的最小成本路径。基本的用法是初始化这个类,然后用一个或多个起始索引(和一个可选的结束索引列表)调用find_costs()。之后,调用traceback()一次或多次,找到从任何给定的终点位置到最近的起始索引的路径。通过重复调用find_costs(),可以找到通过同一costs数组的新路径。

trans-unit.source: Gives a measure for the maximum value of the data in the local region near each vertex. This can be used by visualization tools to apply a colormap to the mesh.
trans-unit.target: 给出每个顶点附近局部区域数据的最大值。可视化工具可以用它来对网格应用柱状图。

trans-unit.target: 然而,分割的结果并不十分令人满意,因为其中一枚硬币根本没有被正确分割。原因是我们从Canny检测器得到的轮廓并不是完全封闭的,因此填充函数并没有填充到硬币的内部。

trans-unit.source: Ideally, for signed integers we would simply multiply by -1. However, signed integer ranges are asymmetric. For example, for np.int8, the range of possible values is [-128, 127], so that -128 * -1 equals -128! By subtracting from -1, we correctly map the maximum dtype value to the minimum.
trans-unit.target: 理想情况下,对于有符号的整数,我们可以简单地乘以-1。然而,有符号整数的范围是不对称的。例如,对于 np.int8,可能的值范围是 [-128,127],所以 -128*-1 等于 -128! 通过减去-1,我们正确地将最大dtype值映射到最小值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies most prominent circles separated by certain distances in a Hough space. Non-maximum suppression with different sizes is applied separately in the first and second dimension of the Hough space to identify peaks.
trans-unit.target: 识别Hough空间中以一定距离分开的最突出的圆。在Hough空间的第一维和第二维中分别采用不同尺寸的非最大抑制来识别峰值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies most prominent circles separated by certain distances in given Hough spaces. Non-maximum suppression with different sizes is applied separately in the first and second dimension of the Hough space to identify peaks. For circles with different radius but close in distance, only the one with highest peak is kept.
trans-unit.target: 在给定的Hough空间中识别出以一定距离分开的最突出的圆。在Hough空间的第一维和第二维中分别采用不同尺寸的非最大抑制来识别峰值。对于半径不同但距离很近的圆,只保留最高峰的那个圆。

trans-unit.source: Identifies most prominent lines separated by a certain angle and distance in a Hough transform. Non-maximum suppression with different sizes is applied separately in the first (distances) and second (angles) dimension of the Hough space to identify peaks.
trans-unit.target: 识别Hough变换中以一定角度和距离分开的最突出的线。在Hough空间的第一维(距离)和第二维(角度)中分别使用不同尺寸的非最大抑制来识别峰值。

trans-unit.source: If ‘True’ (default), the minimum-cost-path to every specified end-position will be found; otherwise the algorithm will stop when a a path is found to any end-position. (If no ends were specified, then this parameter has no effect.)
trans-unit.target: 如果为“ True”（默认），则将找到每个指定终点的最小成本路径；否则，当找到任何终点的路径时，算法将停止。（如果未指定任何 ends ，则此参数无效。）

trans-unit.source: If True and the image is 2D, use a much faster approximate computation. This argument has no effect on 3D and higher images.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，且图像为2D，则使用更快的近似计算。此参数对3D和更高的图像没有影响。

trans-unit.source: If True, a pixel at coordinate, e.g., (4, 7) will be represented by coordinates (3.5, 7), (4.5, 7), (4, 6.5), and (4, 7.5). This adds some “extent” to a pixel when computing the hull.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则坐标（3.5，7），（4.5，7），（4，6.5）和（4，7.5）表示坐标（4，7）处的像素。计算船体时，这会在像素上增加一些“范围”。

trans-unit.source: If True, allow shapes to overlap.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则允许形状重叠。

trans-unit.source: If True, compute eagerly returning a NumPy Array. If False, compute lazily returning a Dask Array. If None (default), compute based on array type provided (eagerly for NumPy Arrays and lazily for Dask Arrays).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，请计算返回一个NumPy数组。如果为 False ，则计算延迟返回Dask数组。如果为 None （默认），则根据提供的数组类型进行计算（对于NumPy Arrays急切，对于Dask Arrays则懒惰）。

trans-unit.source: If True, ensure the returned array is a contiguous copy. Normally, a crop operation will return a discontiguous view of the underlying input array.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，请确保返回的数组是连续副本。通常，裁剪操作将返回基础输入数组的不连续视图。

trans-unit.source: If True, remove the connected components in the input array itself. Otherwise, make a copy.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则除去输入阵列本身中的连接组件。否则，请进行复印。

trans-unit.source: If True, remove the objects in the input array itself. Otherwise, make a copy.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则删除输入数组本身中的对象。否则，请进行复印。

trans-unit.source: If behavior=='rank', selem is a 2-D array of 1’s and 0’s. If behavior=='ndimage', selem is a N-D array of 1’s and 0’s with the same number of dimension than image. If None, selem will be a N-D array with 3 elements for each dimension (e.g., vector, square, cube, etc.)
trans-unit.target: 如果 behavior=='rank' ，则 selem 是1和0的2维数组。如果 behavior=='ndimage' ，则 selem 是1和0的ND数组，其维数与 image 相同。如果为None，则 selem 将是一个ND数组，每个维度包含3个元素（例如，矢量，正方形，立方体等）

trans-unit.source: If method == "VisuShrink", a single “universal threshold” is applied to all wavelet detail coefficients as described in [2]. This threshold is designed to remove all Gaussian noise at a given sigma with high probability, but tends to produce images that appear overly smooth.
trans-unit.target: 如果 method == "VisuShrink" ，则将单个“通用阈值”应用于所有小波细节系数，如[2]中所述。此阈值旨在以高概率消除给定 sigma 处的所有高斯噪声，但往往会产生看起来过于平滑的图像。

trans-unit.source: If method == "VisuShrink", a single “universal threshold” is applied to all wavelet detail coefficients as described in [2]. This threshold is designed to remove all Gaussian noise at a given sigma with high probability, but tends to produce images that appear overly smooth.

trans-unit.source: If sigma is scalar and spacing is provided, the kernel width is divided along each dimension by the spacing. For example, if sigma=1 and spacing=[5, 1, 1], the effective sigma is [0.2, 1, 1]. This ensures sensible smoothing for anisotropic images.
trans-unit.target: 如果 sigma 是标量并且提供了 spacing ，则将内核宽度沿每个维度除以间距。例如，如果 sigma=1 和 spacing=[5, 1, 1] sigma ]，则有效sigma为 [0.2, 1, 1] 。这样可以确保对各向异性图像进行合理的平滑处理。

trans-unit.source: If False (default), return only the lowest threshold that satisfies the above equality. If True, return all valid thresholds.
trans-unit.target: 如果False(默认),只返回满足上述平等条件的最低阈值。如果为真,返回所有有效的阈值。

trans-unit.source: If False, disable processing of OME-XML metadata.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 "False",则禁用OME-XML元数据的处理。

trans-unit.source: If False, no rescaling of the user-provided sigma will be performed. The default of None rescales sigma appropriately if the image is rescaled internally. A DeprecationWarning is raised to warn the user about this new behaviour. This warning can be avoided by setting rescale_sigma=True.
trans-unit.target: 如果为False，将不对用户提供的 sigma 进行重新缩放。如果图像在内部进行了重新缩放，则默认值 None 将适当地重新缩放sigma。一个 DeprecationWarning 上调至警告这一新行为的用户。可以通过设置 rescale_sigma=True 来避免此警告。

trans-unit.source: If None (default), adjacent values must be strictly equal to the initial value of image at seed_point. This is fastest. If a value is given, a comparison will be done at every point and if within tolerance of the initial value will also be filled (inclusive).
trans-unit.target: 如果为None（默认值），则相邻值必须严格等于 seed_point 处的 image 的初始值。这是最快的。如果给出值，则将在每个点进行比较，并且如果在初始值的公差范围内，也将进行填充（包括）。

trans-unit.source: If None (default), adjacent values must be strictly equal to the value of image at seed_point to be filled. This is fastest. If a tolerance is provided, adjacent points with values within plus or minus tolerance from the seed point are filled (inclusive).
trans-unit.target: 如果为None（默认），则相邻值必须严格等于要填充的 seed_point 处的 image 值。这是最快的。如果提供了公差，则将填充与种子点具有正或负公差之内的值的相邻点（包括端点）。

trans-unit.source: If None, a new array is allocated.
trans-unit.target: 如果None,则分配一个新的数组。

trans-unit.source: If None, a new array will be allocated.
trans-unit.target: 如果为None,将分配一个新的数组。

trans-unit.source: If True (default value), a fast version of the non-local means algorithm is used. If False, the original version of non-local means is used. See the Notes section for more details about the algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真(默认值),则使用快速版的非本地手段算法。如果为False,则使用非本地手段的原始版本。有关算法的更多细节,请参见 "注释 "部分。

trans-unit.source: If True (default) and the data and parameters are compatible with previous ones, if any, the data are stored contiguously after the previous one. Parameters ‘photometric’ and ‘planarconfig’ are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True（默认值）并且数据和参数与先前的参数兼容（如果有），则数据将连续存储在先前的参数之后。参数“光度”和“ planarconfig”被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If True (default), keep the handles of other files in multifile series closed. This is inefficient when few files refer to many pages. If False, the C runtime may run out of resources.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True(默认),关闭多文件系列中其他文件的句柄。当很少的文件引用很多页时,这样的效率很低。如果为False,C运行时可能会耗尽资源。

trans-unit.source: If True (default), series may include pages from multiple files. Currently applies to OME-TIFF only.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True(默认),系列可以包括多个文件的页面。目前只适用于 OME-TIFF。

trans-unit.source: If True (default), the output will be clipped after noise applied for modes ‘speckle’, ‘poisson’, and ‘gaussian’. This is needed to maintain the proper image data range. If False, clipping is not applied, and the output may extend beyond the range [-1, 1].
trans-unit.target: 如果为True（默认），则在对 ‘speckle’ ， ‘poisson’ 和 ‘gaussian’ 模式施加噪声之后，输出将被削波。这是维持适当的图像数据范围所必需的。如果为False，则不应用裁剪，并且输出可能会超出范围[-1，1]。

trans-unit.source: If True (default), try to use only the metadata from the first page of ImageJ files. Significantly speeds up loading movies with thousands of pages.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True(默认),尝试只使用ImageJ文件第一页的元数据。大大加快了数千页的电影加载速度。

trans-unit.source: If True and ‘file’ is an existing standard TIFF file, image data and tags are appended to the file. Appending data may corrupt specifically formatted TIFF files such as LSM, STK, ImageJ, NIH, or FluoView.
trans-unit.target: 如果True和'file'是现有的标准TIFF文件，则图像数据和标签将附加到该文件中。追加数据可能会破坏诸如LSM，STK，ImageJ，NIH或FluoView之类的格式特殊的TIFF文件。

trans-unit.source: If True and multichannel True, do the wavelet denoising in the YCbCr colorspace instead of the RGB color space. This typically results in better performance for RGB images.
trans-unit.target: 如果True和多通道True,则在YCbCr颜色空间而不是RGB颜色空间中进行小波去噪。这通常会给RGB图像带来更好的性能。

trans-unit.source: If True and the image is of type float, the range is assumed to be [-1, 1]. If False and the image is of type float, the range is assumed to be [0, 1].
trans-unit.target: 如果为真且图像类型为float,则假设范围为[-1,1]。如果为False且图像类型为float,则假设范围为[0,1]。

trans-unit.source: If True then treat low_threshold and high_threshold as quantiles of the edge magnitude image, rather than absolute edge magnitude values. If True then the thresholds must be in the range [0, 1].
trans-unit.target: 如果True,那么将low_threshold和high_threshold作为边缘幅度图像的量子值,而不是绝对的边缘幅度值。如果True,那么阈值必须在[0,1]的范围内。

trans-unit.source: If True, ImageCollection does not keep more than one in memory at a specific time. Otherwise, images will be cached once they are loaded.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True，则 ImageCollection 在特定时间不会在内存中保留多个内存。否则，图像将在加载后被缓存。

trans-unit.source: If True, also return the full structural similarity image.
trans-unit.target: 如果True,也返回完整的结构相似性图像。

trans-unit.source: If True, also return the gradient with respect to Y.
trans-unit.target: 如果True,也返回相对于Y的梯度。

trans-unit.source: If True, also return the gradient with respect to im2.
trans-unit.target: 如果True,也返回相对于im2的梯度。

trans-unit.source: If True, an array containing each separate polygon drawn is returned. (The polygons may overlap.) If False (default), latter polygons “overwrite” earlier ones where they overlap.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True，则返回包含每个绘制的多边形的数组。（多边形可能重叠。）如果为False（默认值），则后面的多边形“覆盖”之前重叠的多边形。

trans-unit.source: If True, clip the negative range (i.e. return 0 for min intensity) even if the image dtype allows negative values.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True,即使图像dtype允许负值,也要夹取负值范围(即返回0的最小强度)。

trans-unit.source: If True, clip the negative range (i.e. return 0 for min intensity) even if the image dtype allows negative values. The default behavior (None) is equivalent to True.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True,即使图像dtype允许负值,也会剪掉负值范围(即返回0的最小强度)。默认行为(None)等同于True。

trans-unit.source: If True, convert color images to gray-scale (64-bit floats). Images that are already in gray-scale format are not converted.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,则将彩色图像转换为灰度格式(64位浮点数)。已经是灰度格式的图像不会被转换。

trans-unit.source: If True, diagonal moves are permitted, if False, only axial moves.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,允许对角线移动,如果为假,只允许轴向移动。

trans-unit.source: If True, each patch has its mean and variance spatially weighted by a normalized Gaussian kernel of width sigma=1.5.
trans-unit.target: 如果True,每个补丁的均值和方差由宽度为sigma=1.5的归一化高斯核进行空间加权。

trans-unit.source: If True, flood filling is applied to image in place. If False, the flood filled result is returned without modifying the input image (default).
trans-unit.target: 如果为True，则将洪水填充应用于适当的 image 。如果为False，则返回泛洪填充结果，而不修改输入 image （默认值）。

trans-unit.source: If True, input data is parsed as multichannel data (see ‘data’ above for proper input format in this case)
trans-unit.target: 如果为True，则将输入数据解析为多通道数据（在这种情况下，请参见上面的“数据”以获取正确的输入格式）

trans-unit.source: If True, input data is parsed as multichannel data (see ‘data’ above for proper input format in this case).
trans-unit.target: 如果为True，则将输入数据解析为多通道数据（在这种情况下，请参见上面的“数据”以获取正确的输入格式）。

trans-unit.source: If True, it performs inverse logarithmic correction, else correction will be logarithmic. Defaults to False.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True,则执行反对数修正,否则将进行对数修正。默认值为False。

trans-unit.source: If True, never keep more than one in memory at a specific time. Otherwise, images will be cached once they are loaded.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True,则在特定时间内永远不要在内存中保存超过一张。否则,图像一旦加载就会被缓存。

trans-unit.source: If True, normalize covariances by N-1 rather than, N where N is the number of pixels within the sliding window.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,将协方差标准化为N-1,而不是N,其中N是滑动窗口内的像素数。

trans-unit.source: If True, normalize each matrix P[:, :, d, theta] by dividing by the total number of accumulated co-occurrences for the given offset. The elements of the resulting matrix sum to 1. The default is False.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True，则通过除以给定偏移量的累积共现总数，将每个矩阵 P[:, :, d, theta] 归一化。结果矩阵的元素总和为1。默认值为False。

trans-unit.source: If True, normalize the accumulator by the radius to sort the prominent peaks.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True,则按半径对累加器进行归一化处理,对突出的峰进行排序。

trans-unit.source: If True, normalize the histogram by the sum of its values.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True,则用直方图的值之和来归一化直方图。

trans-unit.source: If True, pad image so that output is the same size as the image, and output values correspond to the template center. Otherwise, the output is an array with shape (M - m + 1, N - n + 1) for an (M, N) image and an (m, n) template, and matches correspond to origin (top-left corner) of the template.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True，则填充 image 以使输出与图像大小相同，并且输出值对应于模板中心。否则，该输出是具有形状的阵列 (M - m + 1, N - n + 1) 为 (M, N) 图像和 (m, n) 的模板，匹配对应于原点（左上角）模板。

trans-unit.source: If True, return an read-only array stored in a binary file on disk if possible. The TIFF file is used if possible, else a temporary file is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True,尽可能返回一个存储在磁盘二进制文件中的只读数组。如果可能的话,使用TIFF文件,否则会创建一个临时文件。

trans-unit.source: If True, return parameters and losses in addition to the calibrated denoising function
trans-unit.target: 如果为True,则返回除校准去噪函数以外的参数和损失。

trans-unit.source: If True, return the full structural similarity image instead of the mean value.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True,返回完整的结构相似度图像,而不是平均值。

trans-unit.source: If True, returns the level set for this ellipsoid (signed level set about zero, with positive denoting interior) as np.float64. False returns a binarized version of said level set.
trans-unit.target: 如果True,返回这个椭球体的水平集(关于零的有符号水平集,正表示内部)为np.float64。False则返回该水平集的二值化版本。

trans-unit.source: If True, returns the negative sigmoid correction. Defaults to False.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True,返回负的sigmoid修正。默认值为False。

trans-unit.source: If True, show only those plugins currently loaded. By default, all plugins are shown.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,只显示当前加载的插件。默认情况下,会显示所有插件。

trans-unit.source: If True, the BigTIFF format is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,则使用BigTIFF格式。

trans-unit.source: If True, the MCP_Geometric class is used to calculate costs, if False, the MCP base class is used. See the class documentation for an explanation of the differences between MCP and MCP_Geometric.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True,则使用MCP_Geometric类来计算成本,如果为False,则使用MCP基础类。关于MCP和MCP_Geometric之间的区别,请参见类文档。

trans-unit.source: If True, the generated image has num_channels color channels, otherwise generates grayscale image.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True，则生成的图像具有 num_channels 个颜色通道，否则生成灰度图像。

trans-unit.source: If True, the last arr_in dimension is threated as a color channel, otherwise as spatial.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True，则最后一个 arr_in 维将威胁为颜色通道，否则将威胁为空间通道。

trans-unit.source: If True, the last image dimension is considered as a color channel, otherwise as spatial.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True，则将最后一个 image 尺寸视为一个颜色通道，否则视为空间。

trans-unit.source: If True, the last image dimension is considered as a color channel, otherwise as spatial. Color channels are processed individually.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True，则将最后一个 image 尺寸视为一个颜色通道，否则视为空间。色彩通道是单独处理的。

trans-unit.source: If True, the matched keypoints are returned after cross checking i.e. a matched pair (keypoint1, keypoint2) is returned if keypoint2 is the best match for keypoint1 in second image and keypoint1 is the best match for keypoint2 in first image.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True,则在交叉检查后返回匹配的关键点,即如果keypoint2是第二个图像中keypoint1的最佳匹配点,而keypoint1是第一个图像中keypoint2的最佳匹配点,则返回匹配的一对(keypoint1,keypoint2)。

trans-unit.source: If True, the output matrix P[:, :, d, theta] is symmetric. This is accomplished by ignoring the order of value pairs, so both (i, j) and (j, i) are accumulated when (i, j) is encountered for a given offset. The default is False.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True，则输出矩阵 P[:, :, d, theta] 是对称的。这是通过忽略值对的顺序来实现的，因此在给定偏移量遇到（i，j）时，将同时累积（i，j）和（j，i）。默认值为False。

trans-unit.source: If True, the output will be a tuple of one-dimensional arrays representing the indices of local maxima in each dimension. If False, the output will be a boolean array with the same shape as image.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True，则输出将为一维数组的元组，表示每个维中的局部最大值的索引。如果为False，则输出将是一个与 image 形状相同的布尔数组。

trans-unit.source: If True, the output will be a tuple of one-dimensional arrays representing the indices of local minima in each dimension. If False, the output will be a boolean array with the same shape as image.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True，则输出将是一维数组的元组，表示每个维中的局部最小值的索引。如果为False，则输出将是一个与 image 形状相同的布尔数组。

trans-unit.source: If True, the output will be an array representing peak coordinates. If False, the output will be a boolean array shaped as image.shape with peaks present at True elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True，则输出将为代表峰值坐标的数组。如果为False，则输出将为形状为 image.shape 的布尔数组，在True元素处出现峰值。

trans-unit.source: If True, the output will be an array representing peak coordinates. The coordinates are sorted according to peaks values (Larger first). If False, the output will be a boolean array shaped as image.shape with peaks present at True elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True，则输出将为代表峰值坐标的数组。根据峰值对坐标进行排序（大）。如果为False，则输出将为形状为 image.shape 的布尔数组，且在True元素处出现峰值。

trans-unit.source: If True, the probability that a pixel belongs to each of the labels will be returned, instead of only the most likely label.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,将返回一个像素属于每个标签的概率,而不是只返回最有可能的标签。

trans-unit.source: If True, the tag is written to the first page only.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,标签只写到第一页。

trans-unit.source: If True, treat the last dimension of the array as channels. Similarity calculations are done independently for each channel then averaged.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True,将数组的最后一个维度视为通道。每个通道的相似性计算是独立进行的,然后取平均值。

trans-unit.source: If True, use blitting to speed up animation. Only available on some Matplotlib backends. If None, set to True when using Agg backend. This only has an effect if you draw on top of an image viewer.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True,使用blitting来加速动画。仅在某些Matplotlib后端可用。如果无,使用Agg后端时设置为True。只有当你在图像查看器的顶部绘制时才会有此效果。

trans-unit.source: If True, write an ImageJ hyperstack compatible file. This format can handle data types uint8, uint16, or float32 and data shapes up to 6 dimensions in TZCYXS order. RGB images (S=3 or S=4) must be uint8. ImageJ’s default byte order is big endian but this implementation uses the system’s native byte order by default. ImageJ does not support BigTIFF format or LZMA compression. The ImageJ file format is undocumented.
trans-unit.target: 如果为True，则编写ImageJ超级堆栈兼容文件。此格式可以处理uint8，uint16或float32数据类型，以及按TZCYXS顺序最多6个维度的数据形状。RGB图像（S = 3或S = 4）必须为uint8。ImageJ的默认字节顺序为big endian，但此实现默认使用系统的本机字节顺序。ImageJ不支持BigTIFF格式或LZMA压缩。ImageJ文件格式未记录。

trans-unit.source: If a glob string is given for load_pattern, this attribute stores the expanded file list. Otherwise, this is simply equal to load_pattern.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 load_pattern 提供了全局字符串，则此属性存储扩展的文件列表。否则，这仅等于 load_pattern 。

trans-unit.source: If a mask is given, only those elements in image with a true value in mask are used for computing the medial axis.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了蒙版，则仅将 image 中 mask 中值为真的那些元素用于计算中间轴。

trans-unit.source: If a max-tree representation (parent and tree_traverser) are given to the function, they must be calculated from the inverted image for this function, i.e.: >>> P, S = max_tree(invert(f)) >>> closed = diameter_closing(f, 3, parent=P, tree_traverser=S)
trans-unit.target: 如果为该函数提供了最大树表示（parent和tree_traverser），则必须从该函数的倒像中计算得出它们，即：>>> P，S = max_tree（invert（f））>>> closed =直径关闭（f，3，父代= P，tree_traverser = S）

trans-unit.source: If a pattern string is given for load_pattern, this attribute stores the expanded file list. Otherwise, this is equal to load_pattern.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 load_pattern 提供了模式字符串，则此属性存储扩展的文件列表。否则，它等于 load_pattern 。

trans-unit.source: If a scalar is given, then its value is used for all dimensions. If sequence is given, then there must be exactly one radius for each dimension except the last dimension for multichannel images. Note that 0 radius means no blurring, and negative values are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定一个标量,那么它的值将用于所有维度。如果给定了序列,那么除了多通道图像的最后一个维度外,每个维度必须有一个确切的半径。请注意,0半径意味着没有模糊,不允许使用负值。

trans-unit.source: If an integer, shifts in range(0, max_shifts+1) will be used along each axis of x. If a tuple, range(0, max_shifts[i]+1) will be along axis i.
trans-unit.target: 如果是整数，将沿 x 的每个轴使用 range(0, max_shifts+1) 。如果是元组，则 range(0, max_shifts[i]+1) 将沿着轴i。

trans-unit.source: If any of the pixels are invalid (Z < 0).
trans-unit.target: 如果任何像素无效（Z <0）。

trans-unit.source: If both threshold_abs and threshold_rel are provided, the maximum of the two is chosen as the minimum intensity threshold of peaks.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时提供了 threshold_abs 和 threshold_rel ，则选择两者中的最大值作为峰值的最小强度阈值。

trans-unit.source: If both sigmas and ring_radii are given, they must satisfy the following predicate since no radius is needed for the center histogram.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时给定sigmas和ring_radii,它们必须满足下面的前提条件,因为中心直方图不需要半径。

trans-unit.source: If called with a masked 1D array or called with a 1D array and wrap_around=True.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用带掩码的1D数组调用或使用1D数组调用并且 wrap_around=True 。

trans-unit.source: If copy is False, the labels array will be overwritten with the result of the segmentation. Use copy=False if you want to save on memory.
trans-unit.target: 如果copy为False，则 labels 数组将被分段结果覆盖。如果要保存在内存中，请使用copy = False。

trans-unit.source: If cv_image is an array of unsigned bytes, skimage will understand it by default. If you prefer working with floating point images, img_as_float() can be used to convert the image:
trans-unit.target: 如果cv_image是一个无符号字节数组，则 skimage 将默认理解它。如果您喜欢使用浮点图像，则可以使用 img_as_float() 转换图像：

trans-unit.source: If either the illuminant or the observer angle are not supported or unknown.
trans-unit.target: 如果发光体或观察者角度都不支持或未知。

trans-unit.source: If either the illuminant or the observer angle is unsupported or unknown.
trans-unit.target: 如果发光体或观察者角度不支持或未知。

trans-unit.source: If fromspace is not a valid color space
trans-unit.target: 如果fromspace不是有效的颜色空间

trans-unit.source: If given and True, the classic marching cubes by Lorensen (1987) is used. This option is included for reference purposes. Note that this algorithm has ambiguities and is not guaranteed to produce a topologically correct result. The results with using this option are not generally the same as the marching_cubes_classic() function.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定为True，则使用Lorensen（1987）的经典行军立方体。包含此选项仅供参考。请注意，此算法有歧义，不能保证产生正确的拓扑结果。使用此选项的结果是不通常一样 marching_cubes_classic() 函数。

trans-unit.source: If given, this function is called once per iteration with the current level set as the only argument. This is useful for debugging or for plotting intermediate results during the evolution.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定,这个函数在每次迭代时调用一次,并将当前级别设置为唯一参数。这对于调试或绘制演化过程中的中间结果很有用。

trans-unit.source: If images in ic don’t have identical shapes.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ic 中的图像没有相同的形状。

trans-unit.source: If images in the ImageCollection don’t have identical shapes.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ImageCollection 中的图像没有相同的形状。

trans-unit.source: If images in the ImageCollection don’t have identical shapes.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ImageCollection 中的图像没有相同的形状。

trans-unit.source: If indices are desired rather than masks for memory reasons, the user can simply run numpy.nonzero on the result, save the indices, and discard this mask.
trans-unit.target: 如果由于内存原因需要索引而不是掩码，则用户可以对结果简单地运行 numpy.nonzero ，保存索引并丢弃此掩码。

trans-unit.source: If int, random_state is the seed used by the random number generator; If RandomState instance, random_state is the random number generator; If None, the random number generator is the RandomState instance used by np.random.
trans-unit.target: 如果为int，则random_state是随机数生成器使用的种子；否则为false。如果是RandomState实例，则random_state是随机数生成器；如果没有，随机数生成器所使用的RandomState实例 np.random 。

trans-unit.source: If int, random_state is the seed used by the random number generator; If RandomState instance, random_state is the random number generator; If None, the random number generator is the RandomState instance used by np.random. The random state is used for the starting point of scipy.sparse.linalg.eigsh.
trans-unit.target: 如果为int，则random_state是随机数生成器使用的种子；否则为false。如果是RandomState实例，则random_state是随机数生成器；否则，如果没有，随机数生成器所使用的RandomState实例 np.random 。随机状态用于 scipy.sparse.linalg.eigsh 的起点。

trans-unit.source: If int, random_state is the seed used by the random number generator; If RandomState instance, random_state is the random number generator; If None, the random number generator is the RandomState instance used by np.random. The random state is used when generating a set of features smaller than the total number of available features.
trans-unit.target: 如果为int，则random_state是随机数生成器使用的种子；否则为false。如果是RandomState实例，则random_state是随机数生成器；如果没有，随机数生成器所使用的RandomState实例 np.random 。当生成的特征集少于可用特征总数时，将使用随机状态。

trans-unit.source: If memmap is True, return an array stored in a binary file on disk. The args and kwargs parameters are passed to the imread function.
trans-unit.target: 如果memmap为True,返回一个存储在磁盘二进制文件中的数组。args和kwargs参数被传递给imread函数。

trans-unit.source: If no offsets are provided, this determines the connectivity of the generated neighborhood. If true, the path may go along diagonals between elements of the costs array; otherwise only axial moves are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供 offsets ，则这确定了所生成邻域的连通性。如果为true，则路径可能沿着 costs 数组元素之间的对角线移动；否则只能轴向移动。

trans-unit.source: If nonzero, exclude_border excludes peaks from within exclude_border-pixels of the border of the image.
trans-unit.target: 如果不为零，则 exclude_border 会从图像边框的 exclude_border -像素内排除峰。

trans-unit.source: If peaks are flat (i.e. multiple adjacent pixels have identical intensities), the coordinates of all such pixels are returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果峰值是平坦的(即多个相邻的像素具有相同的强度),则返回所有这些像素的坐标。

trans-unit.source: If pooch is not install, this error will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果pooch没有安装,就会出现这个错误。

trans-unit.source: If positive integer, exclude_border excludes peaks from within exclude_border-pixels of the border of the image. If tuple of non-negative ints, the length of the tuple must match the input array’s dimensionality. Each element of the tuple will exclude peaks from within exclude_border-pixels of the border of the image along that dimension. If True, takes the min_distance parameter as value. If zero or False, peaks are identified regardless of their distance from the border.
trans-unit.target: 如果为正整数，则 exclude_border 会从图像边框的 exclude_border -像素内排除峰。如果元组为非负整数，则元组的长度必须与输入数组的维数匹配。元组的每个元素都将沿着该维度在图像边框的 exclude_border -像素内排除峰。如果为True，则将 min_distance 参数作为值。如果为零或假，则将识别峰，而与峰距边界的距离无关。

trans-unit.source: If provided, footprint == 1 represents the local region within which to search for peaks at every point in image. Overrides min_distance (also for exclude_border).
trans-unit.target: 如果提供， footprint == 1 表示要在 image 中每个点上搜索峰值的局部区域。覆盖 min_distance （也适用于 exclude_border ）。

trans-unit.source: If provided, footprint == 1 represents the local region within which to search for peaks at every point in image. Overrides min_distance.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供， footprint == 1 表示要在 image 中每个点上搜索峰值的局部区域。覆盖 min_distance 。

trans-unit.source: If provided, each unique region labels == value represents a unique region to search for peaks. Zero is reserved for background.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供，则每个唯一区域 labels == value 表示搜索峰的唯一区域。零保留为背景。

trans-unit.source: If provided, superpixels are computed only where mask is True, and seed points are homogeneously distributed over the mask using a K-means clustering strategy.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供,则只在掩模为True的地方计算超级像素,并使用K-means聚类策略将种子点均匀地分布在掩模上。

trans-unit.source: If provided, this will set the random seed before generating noise, for valid pseudo-random comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供,这将在产生噪声之前设置随机种子,用于有效的伪随机比较。

trans-unit.source: If scale is 1, the figure and axes have the same dimension as the image. Smaller values of scale will shrink the figure.
trans-unit.target: 如果比例为1，则图形和轴与图像的尺寸相同。较小的 scale 将缩小图形。

trans-unit.source: If set intermediate values of standard deviations are interpolated using a logarithmic scale to the base 10. If not, linear interpolation is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，则使用对数刻度将标准偏差的中间值插入基数 10 。如果不是，则使用线性插值。

trans-unit.source: If set to True, the merged node has the id dst, else merged node has a new id which is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 True ，则合并节点的ID为 dst ，否则合并节点的ID将返回新的ID。

trans-unit.source: If set to True, the return value will be a tuple containing the three return values (see below). If set to False which is the default value, only the ‘segmentation’ array will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为True，则返回值将是一个包含三个返回值的元组（请参见下文）。如果设置为False（默认值），则仅返回“ segmentation”数组。

trans-unit.source: If set, modifies rag in place. For each node n the function will set a new attribute rag.node[n]['ncut label'].
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，请在适当位置修改 rag 。对于每个节点 n ,该函数将设置一个新属性 rag.node[n]['ncut label'] 。

trans-unit.source: If set, modifies rag in place. For each node n the function will set a new attribute rag.nodes[n]['ncut label'].
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，请在适当位置修改 rag 。对于每个节点 n ,该函数将设置一个新属性 rag.nodes[n]['ncut label'] 。

trans-unit.source: If set, modifies rag in place. The function will remove the edges with weights less that thresh. If set to False the function makes a copy of rag before proceeding.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，请在适当位置修改 rag 。该功能将删除重量小于 thresh 的边缘。如果设置为 False ,则该函数在继续之前会复制 rag 。

trans-unit.source: If set, the image and energy_map are copied before being used by the method which modifies it in place. Set this to False if the original image and the energy map are no longer needed after this operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，则 image 和 energy_map 将被复制，然后由对其进行修改的方法使用。如果此操作后不再需要原始图像和能量图，则将其设置为 False 。

trans-unit.source: If set, the RAG copied before modifying.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,则在修改前复制RAG。

trans-unit.source: If set, the RAG is modified in place. For each node n the function will set a new attribute rag.node[n]['centroid'].
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，则将修改RAG。对于每个节点 n ,该函数将设置一个新属性 rag.node[n]['centroid'] 。

trans-unit.source: If set, the RAG is modified in place. For each node n the function will set a new attribute rag.nodes[n]['centroid'].
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，则将修改RAG。对于每个节点 n ,该函数将设置一个新属性 rag.nodes[n]['centroid'] 。

trans-unit.source: If set, the nodes are merged in place. Otherwise, a new node is created for each merge..
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了,则节点就地合并。否则,每次合并都会创建一个新的节点。

trans-unit.source: If the array type is int, it is assumed that it contains already-labeled objects. The labels are not kept in the output image (this function always outputs a bool image). It is suggested that labeling is completed after using this function.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组类型为int,则假定它包含已经标记的对象。标签不会保留在输出图像中(这个函数总是输出一个bool图像)。建议在使用该函数后完成标签的制作。

trans-unit.source: If the image array has less than two or more than four dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像数组的尺寸小于二维或大于四维。

trans-unit.source: If the input array contains negative values.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入数组包含负值。

trans-unit.source: If the input array is of an invalid type, such as float or string.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入数组的类型无效,如float或string。

trans-unit.source: If the input image is constant, the output will be clipped directly to the output range: >>> image = np.array([130, 130, 130], dtype=np.int32) >>> rescale_intensity(image, out_range=(0, 127)).astype(np.int32) array([127, 127, 127], dtype=int32)
trans-unit.target: 如果输入图像恒定，则输出将直接剪切到输出范围：>>> image = np.array（[130，130，130]，dtype = np.int32）>>> rescale_intensity（image，out_range = （0，127））。astype（np.int32）数组（[127，127，127]，dtype = int32）

trans-unit.source: If the input is 3D, this function performs wavelet denoising on each color plane separately.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入是3D,该函数对每个颜色平面分别进行小波去噪。

trans-unit.source: If the input is 3D, this function performs wavelet denoising on each color plane separately. The output image is clipped between either [-1, 1] and [0, 1] depending on the input image range.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入的是3D图像,该函数对每个颜色平面分别进行小波去噪。根据输入图像的范围,输出图像在[-1,1]和[0,1]之间进行剪切。

trans-unit.source: If the input is a 1-dimensional image of shape (M, ), the output will be shape (M, 3).
trans-unit.target: 如果输入是形状 (M, ) 一维图像，则输出将是形状 (M, 3) 。

trans-unit.source: If the input is not a 1-, 2- or 3-dimensional image.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入的不是1、2或3维图像。

trans-unit.source: If the line is parallel to the given axis.
trans-unit.target: 如果该线与给定的轴线平行。

trans-unit.source: If the min/max value of in_range is more/less than the min/max image intensity, then the intensity levels are clipped:
trans-unit.target: 如果 in_range 的最小值/最大值大于/小于图像的最小值/最大值，则将剪切强度级别：

trans-unit.source: If the noise standard deviation, sigma, is provided a more robust computation of patch weights is used. Subtracting the known noise variance from the computed patch distances improves the estimates of patch similarity, giving a moderate improvement to denoising performance [4]. It was also mentioned as an option for the fast variant of the algorithm in [3].
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了噪声标准偏差 sigma ，则使用更健壮的补丁权重计算。从计算出的音色距离中减去已知的噪声方差会改善音色相似度的估计，从而对降噪性能进行适度的改善[4]。在[3]中也提到了该算法的快速变体选项。

trans-unit.source: If the noise standard deviation, sigma, is provided a more robust computation of patch weights is used. Subtracting the known noise variance from the computed patch distances improves the estimates of patch similarity, giving a moderate improvement to denoising performance [4]. It was also mentioned as an option for the fast variant of the algorithm in [3].
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了噪声标准偏差 sigma ，则使用更健壮的补丁权重计算。从计算出的音色距离中减去已知的噪声方差会改善音色相似度的估计，从而对降噪性能进行适度的改善[4]。在[3]中也提到了该算法的快速变体选项。

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple local maxima with identical pixel intensities inside the region defined with min_distance, the coordinates of all such pixels are returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 min_distance 定义的区域内有多个具有相同像素强度的局部最大值，则返回所有此类像素的坐标。

trans-unit.source: If there is an alpha channel present, it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果有阿尔法通道存在,则会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If tospace is not a valid color space
trans-unit.target: 如果tospace不是一个有效的颜色空间

trans-unit.source: If true, average the channel estimates of sigma. Otherwise return a list of sigmas corresponding to each channel.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则对 sigma 的信道估计值求平均。否则，返回与每个通道相对应的西格玛列表。

trans-unit.source: If true, plateaus that touch the image border are valid maxima.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,触及图像边界的高原是有效的最大值。

trans-unit.source: If true, plateaus that touch the image border are valid minima.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,触及图像边界的高原是有效的最小值。

trans-unit.source: If true, the distance transform is returned as well as the skeleton.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,则返回距离变换以及骨架。

trans-unit.source: If tuple of ints, the length of the tuple must match the input array’s dimensionality. Each element of the tuple will exclude peaks from within exclude_border-pixels of the border of the image along that dimension. If nonzero int, exclude_border excludes peaks from within exclude_border-pixels of the border of the image. If zero or False, peaks are identified regardless of their distance from the border.
trans-unit.target: 如果为整数元组，则元组的长度必须与输入数组的维数匹配。元组的每个元素都将沿着该维度在图像边框的 exclude_border -像素内排除峰。如果int非零，则 exclude_border 会从图像边框的 exclude_border -像素内排除峰。如果为零或假，则将识别峰，而与峰距边界的距离无关。

trans-unit.source: If unable to find two local maxima in the histogram or if the smoothing takes more than 1e4 iterations.
trans-unit.target: 如果不能在直方图中找到两个局部最大值,或者平滑化需要超过1e4次迭代。

trans-unit.source: If using with feature_coord, it should correspond to the feature type of each associated coordinate feature.
trans-unit.target: 如果与 feature_coord 一起使用，则它应对应于每个关联坐标要素的要素类型。

trans-unit.source: If watershed_line is True, a one-pixel wide line separates the regions obtained by the watershed algorithm. The line has the label 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果watershed_line为True,则用分水岭算法得到的区域用一条一像素宽的线分开。该线的标签为0。

trans-unit.source: If you don’t want to simply replace the displayed image with the filtered image (e.g., you want to display a transparent overlay), you can override this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想简单地将显示的图像替换为过滤后的图像（例如，您想要显示透明的叠加层），则可以覆盖此方法。

trans-unit.source: If you have an image with signed integers but want to rescale the image to just the positive range, use the out_range parameter. In that case, the output dtype will be float:
trans-unit.target: 如果您的图像带有带符号的整数，但想要将图像重新缩放到正范围，请使用 out_range 参数。在这种情况下，输出dtype将为float：

trans-unit.source: If you have an image with signed integers but want to rescale the image to just the positive range, use the out_range parameter:
trans-unit.target: 如果您的图像带有带符号的整数，但想要将图像重新缩放到正范围，请使用 out_range 参数：

trans-unit.source: If you need to apply the same filter multiple times over different images, construct the LPIFilter2D and specify it here.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要在不同的图像上多次应用同一个滤镜,请构造LPIFilter2D并在这里指定。

trans-unit.source: Image data are written in one stripe per plane by default. Dimensions larger than 2 to 4 (depending on photometric mode, planar configuration, and SGI mode) are flattened and saved as separate pages. The ‘sample_format’ and ‘bits_per_sample’ tags are derived from the data type.

trans-unit.source: Image pixels can take values determined by the dtype of the image (see Image data types and what they mean), such as 0 to 255 for uint8 images or [0, 1] for floating-point images. However, most images either have a narrower range of values (because of poor contrast), or have most pixel values concentrated in a subrange of the accessible values. skimage.exposure provides functions that spread the intensity values over a larger range.
trans-unit.target: 图像像素可以采用由图像的 dtype 确定的值（请参见Image数据类型及其含义），例如对于 uint8 图像为0到255，对于浮点图像为 [0, 1] 。但是，大多数图像要么具有较窄的值范围（由于对比度差），要么大多数像素值集中在可访问值的子范围内。 skimage.exposure 提供了将强度值分布在更大范围内的函数。

trans-unit.source: Image shape used to determine the maximum bounds of the output coordinates. This is useful for clipping perimeters that exceed the image size. By default, no clipping is done. Must be at least length 2. Only the first two values are used to determine the extent of the input image.

trans-unit.source: Image shape used to determine the maximum bounds of the output coordinates. This is useful for clipping rectangles that exceed the image size. By default, no clipping is done.

trans-unit.source: Image shape which is used to determine maximum extents of output pixel coordinates. This is useful for polygons that exceed the image size. If None, the full extents of the polygon is used.

trans-unit.source: Image shape which is used to determine maximum extents of output pixel coordinates. This is useful for polygons that exceed the image size. If None, the full extents of the polygon is used. Must be at least length 2. Only the first two values are used to determine the extent of the input image.
trans-unit.target: 图像形状,用于确定输出像素坐标的最大外延。这对超过图像大小的多边形很有用。如果为 "无",则使用多边形的全部外延,长度必须至少为2。必须至少是长度2,只有前两个值用于确定输入图像的范围。

trans-unit.source: Image shape which is used to determine the maximum extent of output pixel coordinates. This is useful for circles that exceed the image size. If None, the full extent of the circle is used. Must be at least length 2. Only the first two values are used to determine the extent of the input image.

trans-unit.source: In a scientific context, it is usually better to avoid these formats in favor of a simple directory of images or a multi-dimensional TIF. Video formats are more difficult to read piecemeal, typically do not support random frame access or research-minded meta data, and use lossy compression if not carefully configured. But video files are in widespread use, and they are easy to share, so it is convenient to be equipped to read and write them when necessary.
trans-unit.target: 在科学背景下,通常最好避免这些格式,而采用简单的图像目录或多维TIF。视频格式较难零碎读取,通常不支持随机帧访问或研究思维的元数据,如果不仔细配置,会使用有损压缩。但是视频文件使用广泛,而且容易共享,所以在必要的时候配备读写视频文件是很方便的。

trans-unit.source: In contrast to marching_cubes_classic(), this algorithm is faster, resolves ambiguities, and guarantees topologically correct results. Therefore, this algorithm generally a better choice, unless there is a specific need for the classic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 与 marching_cubes_classic() 相比，此算法更快，可以解决歧义并保证拓扑正确的结果。因此，除非特别需要经典算法，否则此算法通常是更好的选择。

trans-unit.source: In contrast to interpolation in skimage.transform.resize and skimage.transform.rescale this function calculates the local mean of elements in each block of size factors in the input image.
trans-unit.target: 与 skimage.transform.resize 和 skimage.transform.rescale 中的插值相反，此函数计算输入图像中每个尺寸 factors 块中元素的局部均值。

trans-unit.source: In contrast to ordinary least squares line estimation, this estimator minimizes the orthogonal distances of points to the estimated line.
trans-unit.target: 与普通的最小二乘法线估计不同的是,这个估计器将点到估计线的正交距离最小化。

trans-unit.source: In contrast to the 2-D interpolation in skimage.transform.resize and skimage.transform.rescale this function may be applied to N-dimensional images and calculates the local mean of elements in each block of size factors in the input image.
trans-unit.target: 与 skimage.transform.resize 和 skimage.transform.rescale 中的2-D插值相反，此函数可以应用于N维图像，并计算输入图像中每个尺寸 factors 块中元素的局部均值。

trans-unit.source: In contrast with Lorensen et al. approach [2], Lewiner et al. algorithm is faster, resolves ambiguities, and guarantees topologically correct results. Therefore, this algorithm generally a better choice.
trans-unit.target: 与Lorensen等人的方法[2]相比,Lewiner等人的算法速度更快,能解决歧义,并保证拓扑正确的结果。因此,这种算法一般是较好的选择。

trans-unit.source: In this tutorial, we will see how to segment objects from a background. We use the coins image from skimage.data. This image shows several coins outlined against a darker background. The segmentation of the coins cannot be done directly from the histogram of grey values, because the background shares enough grey levels with the coins that a thresholding segmentation is not sufficient.
trans-unit.target: 在本教程中，我们将看到如何从背景中分割对象。我们使用 skimage.data 中的 coins 图像。此图象显示几枚硬币被概述反对黑暗的背景。硬币的分割不能直接从灰度值的直方图中进行，因为背景与硬币共享足够的灰度级，因此阈值分割不足。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether seams are to be removed vertically or horizontally. Removing seams horizontally will decrease the height whereas removing vertically will decrease the width.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the output contours will produce positively-oriented polygons around islands of low- or high-valued elements. If ‘low’ then contours will wind counter- clockwise around elements below the iso-value. Alternately, this means that low-valued elements are always on the left of the contour. (See below for details.)
trans-unit.target: 指示输出轮廓是否会在低值或高值元素的岛周围产生正向多边形。如果为“低”，则轮廓将围绕等值线以下的元素逆时针缠绕。或者，这意味着低值元素始终位于轮廓的左侧。（有关详情，请参见下文。）

trans-unit.source: Initial level set. If an array is given, it will be binarized and used as the initial level set. If a string is given, it defines the method to generate a reasonable initial level set with the shape of the image. Accepted values are ‘checkerboard’ and ‘circle’. See the documentation of checkerboard_level_set and circle_level_set respectively for details about how these level sets are created.
trans-unit.target: 初始水平设置。如果给出了一个数组，它将被二值化并用作初始水平集。如果给出了字符串，则它定义了根据 image 的形状生成合理的初始水平集的方法。可接受的值为“棋盘格”和“圆形”。请参阅的文件 checkerboard_level_set 和 circle_level_set 分别获取有关如何创建这些水平集的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: It applies the Fourier slice theorem to reconstruct an image by multiplying the frequency domain of the filter with the FFT of the projection data. This algorithm is called filtered back projection.

trans-unit.source: It is based on the Douglas-Peucker algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 它是基于Douglas-Peucker算法的。

trans-unit.source: It is possible that you may need to use an image created using skimage with OpenCV or vice versa. OpenCV image data can be accessed (without copying) in NumPy (and, thus, in scikit-image). OpenCV uses BGR (instead of scikit-image’s RGB) for color images, and its dtype is uint8 by default (See Image data types and what they mean). BGR stands for Blue Green Red.
trans-unit.target: 可能需要在OpenCV中使用通过 skimage 创建的图像，反之亦然。可以在NumPy（因此也可以在scikit-image）中访问（无需复制）OpenCV图像数据。OpenCV对彩色图像使用BGR（而不是scikit-image的RGB），默认情况下，其dtype为uint8（请参阅Image数据类型及其含义）。BGR代表蓝绿色红色。

trans-unit.source: It is provided separately from warp to give additional flexibility to users who would like, for example, to re-use a particular coordinate mapping, to use specific dtypes at various points along the the image-warping process, or to implement different post-processing logic than warp performs after the call to ndi.map_coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 它与 warp 分开提供，以给想要例如在图像扭曲过程中各个点重复使用特定坐标映射，在各个点使用特定dtype或实施不同后处理的用户提供额外的灵活性。在调用 ndi.map_coordinates 之后， warp 会执行比逻辑更多的逻辑。

trans-unit.source: It is provided separately from warp to give additional flexibility to users who would like, for example, to re-use a particular coordinate mapping, to use specific dtypes at various points along the the image-warping process, or to implement different post-processing logic than warp performs after the call to ndi.map_coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 它与 warp 分开提供，以给想要例如在图像扭曲过程的各个点重用特定坐标映射，在各个点使用特定dtype或实施不同后处理的用户提供额外的灵活性。在调用 ndi.map_coordinates 之后， warp 会执行比逻辑更多的逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Let us first determine markers of the coins and the background. These markers are pixels that we can label unambiguously as either object or background. Here, the markers are found at the two extreme parts of the histogram of grey values:
trans-unit.target: 首先让我们确定硬币和背景的标记。这些标记是我们可以毫不含糊地标记为对象或背景的像素。在这里,标记是在灰色值直方图的两个极端部分找到的。

trans-unit.source: Let us first try to detect edges that enclose the coins. For edge detection, we use the Canny detector of skimage.feature.canny
trans-unit.target: 让我们首先尝试检测包围硬币的边缘。对于边缘检测，我们使用Canny算子检测器的 skimage.feature.canny

trans-unit.source: Li thresholding
trans-unit.target: 李氏阈值化

trans-unit.source: Li’s iterative method uses gradient descent to find the optimal threshold. If the image intensity histogram contains more than two modes (peaks), the gradient descent could get stuck in a local optimum. An initial guess for the iteration can help the algorithm find the globally-optimal threshold. A float value defines a specific start point, while a callable should take in an array of image intensities and return a float value. Example valid callables include numpy.mean (default), lambda arr: numpy.quantile(arr, 0.95), or even skimage.filters.threshold_otsu().
trans-unit.target: 李的迭代方法使用梯度下降来找到最佳阈值。如果图像强度直方图包含两个以上的模式（峰值），则梯度下降可能会陷入局部最优状态。迭代的初始猜测可以帮助算法找到全局最优阈值。浮点值定义了一个特定的起点，而可调用对象应采用一个图像强度数组并返回一个浮点值。有效的可调用示例包括 numpy.mean （默认值）， lambda arr: numpy.quantile(arr, 0.95) 甚至 skimage.filters.threshold_otsu() 。

trans-unit.source: Liao, P-S., Chen, T-S. and Chung, P-C., “A fast algorithm for multilevel thresholding”, Journal of Information Science and Engineering 17 (5): 713-727, 2001. Available at: <https://ftp.iis.sinica.edu.tw/JISE/2001/200109_01.pdf> DOI:10.6688/JISE.2001.17.5.1
trans-unit.target: 廖PS。，陈TS。和Chung，PC，“的快速算法多级阈值”，杂志信息科学与工程17（5）的：713-727，2001。可在：< https://ftp.iis.sinica.edu.tw/ JISE / 2001 / 200109_01.pdf > DOI：10.6688 / JISE.2001.17.5.1

trans-unit.source: MB-LBP is an extension of LBP that can be computed on multiple scales in constant time using the integral image. Nine equally-sized rectangles are used to compute a feature. For each rectangle, the sum of the pixel intensities is computed. Comparisons of these sums to that of the central rectangle determine the feature, similarly to LBP.
trans-unit.target: MB-LBP是LBP的扩展,它可以使用积分图像在恒定时间内计算多个尺度。九个大小相等的矩形被用来计算一个特征。对于每个矩形,计算像素强度的总和。将这些总和与中心矩形的总和进行比较,从而确定特征,这与LBP类似。

trans-unit.source: Make a first pass over the image’s last dimension and flag candidates for local maxima by comparing pixels in only one direction. If the pixels aren’t connected in the last dimension all pixels are flagged as candidates instead.

trans-unit.target: 每次迭代移动的最大像素距离。

trans-unit.source: Maximum ratio of distances between first and second closest descriptor in the second set of descriptors. This threshold is useful to filter ambiguous matches between the two descriptor sets. The choice of this value depends on the statistics of the chosen descriptor, e.g., for SIFT descriptors a value of 0.8 is usually chosen, see D.G. Lowe, “Distinctive Image Features from Scale-Invariant Keypoints”, International Journal of Computer Vision, 2004.
trans-unit.target: 第二组描述符中第一和第二最接近描述符之间的最大距离比。此阈值可用于过滤两个描述符集之间的歧义匹配。该值的选择取决于所选描述符的统计信息，例如，对于SIFT描述符，通常选择0.8的值，请参见DG Lowe，“尺度不变关键点的独特图像特征”，国际计算机视觉杂志，2004年。

trans-unit.source: Maximum scale to extract keypoints from. The keypoints will be extracted from all the scales except the first and the last i.e. from the scales in the range [min_scale + 1, max_scale - 1]. The filter sizes for different scales is such that the two adjacent scales comprise of an octave.
trans-unit.target: 提取关键点的最大刻度。除了第一个和最后一个音阶之外,所有的音阶都将被提取,即从[min_scale+1,max_scale-1]范围内的音阶中提取关键点。不同音阶的滤波器大小是相邻的两个音阶包含一个八度。

trans-unit.target: Miguel Arevallilo Herraez，David R. Burton，Michael J. Lalor和Munther A. Gdeisat，“基于不连续路径的可靠性排序的快速二维相位展开算法”，Journal Applied Optics，第1卷。41，No. 35（2002）7437，

trans-unit.source: Minimal major axis length.

trans-unit.target: 最小均方误差(Wiener)逆向滤波器。

trans-unit.target: 检测到的线的最小接受长度。增加该参数以提取较长的线条。

trans-unit.source: Minimum allowed overlap ratio between images. The correlation for translations corresponding with an overlap ratio lower than this threshold will be ignored. A lower overlap_ratio leads to smaller maximum translation, while a higher overlap_ratio leads to greater robustness against spurious matches due to small overlap between masked images. Used only if one of reference_mask or moving_mask is None.
trans-unit.target: 图像之间的最小允许重叠率。与重叠率低于此阈值的翻译相对应的相关性将被忽略。较低的 overlap_ratio 导致较小的最大平移，而较高的 overlap_ratio 导致由于屏蔽图像之间的较小重叠而导致的对虚假匹配的更高的鲁棒性。仅当 reference_mask 或 moving_mask 之一为None时使用。

trans-unit.source: Minimum amount of intersecting detections in order for detection to be approved by the function.
trans-unit.target: 为了使检测得到功能的批准,交叉检测的最小数量。

trans-unit.source: Minimum angle separating lines (maximum filter size for second dimension of hough space).
trans-unit.target: 最小的分界线角度(第二维空间的最大过滤器尺寸)。

trans-unit.source: Minimum component size. Enforced using postprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 最小部件尺寸。使用后处理强制执行。

trans-unit.target: 在X维度上,中心之间的最小距离。

trans-unit.source: Minimum distance separating centers in the y dimension.
trans-unit.target: y维度上中心点之间的最小距离。

trans-unit.target: 每个霍夫空间中的最小峰强度。默认值为 0.5 * max(hspace) 。

trans-unit.source: Minimum intensity of peaks, calculated as max(image) * threshold_rel.
trans-unit.target: 峰的最小强度，计算为 max(image) * threshold_rel 。

trans-unit.target: 最小峰强度。默认值为 0.5 * max(hspace) 。

trans-unit.source: Minimum number of consecutive pixels out of 16 pixels on the circle that should all be either brighter or darker w.r.t testpixel. A point c on the circle is darker w.r.t test pixel p if Ic < Ip - threshold and brighter if Ic > Ip + threshold. Also stands for the n in FAST-n corner detector.
trans-unit.target: 圆上16个像素中应该连续变亮或变暗的最小像素数。如果 Ic < Ip - threshold ，则在测试像素p上，圆上的点c较暗，如果 Ic > Ip + threshold 则点c 较亮。在 FAST-n 拐角检测器中也代表n。

trans-unit.source: Minimum number of pixels separating peaks in a region of 2 * min_distance + 1 (i.e. peaks are separated by at least min_distance). To find the maximum number of peaks, use min_distance=1.
trans-unit.target: 在 2 * min_distance + 1 区域内分离峰的最小像素数（即，峰之间至少 min_distance ）。要找到最大的峰数，请使用 min_distance=1 。

trans-unit.source: Minor and major semi-axes. (r/r_radius)**2 + (c/c_radius)**2 = 1.
trans-unit.target: 次要和主要半轴。 (r/r_radius)**2 + (c/c_radius)**2 = 1 。

trans-unit.source: Mode for solving the linear system in the random walker algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 随机行走器算法中求解线性系统的模式。

trans-unit.source: Mode for solving the linear system in the random walker algorithm. If no preference given, automatically attempt to use the fastest option available (‘cg_mg’ from pyamg >> ‘cg’ with UMFPACK > ‘bf’).

trans-unit.source: Modes ‘reflect’ and ‘symmetric’ are similar, but differ in whether the edge pixels are duplicated during the reflection. As an example, if an array has values [0, 1, 2] and was padded to the right by four values using symmetric, the result would be [0, 1, 2, 2, 1, 0, 0], while for reflect it would be [0, 1, 2, 1, 0, 1, 2].
trans-unit.target: 模式“反射”和“对称”相似，但是在反射过程中边缘像素是否重复是不同的。例如，如果数组具有[0，1，2]值，并使用对称值向右填充四个值，则结果将为[0，1，2，2，2，1，0，0]，而对于反映它将是[0，1，2，1，0，1，2]。

trans-unit.source: Morphological dilation sets a pixel at (i,j) to the maximum over all pixels in the neighborhood centered at (i,j). Dilation enlarges bright regions and shrinks dark regions.
trans-unit.target: 形态扩张将(i,j)处的像素设置为以(i,j)为中心的邻域内所有像素的最大值。扩张扩大了明亮区域,缩小了黑暗区域。

trans-unit.source: Morphological dilation sets a pixel at (i,j) to the maximum over all pixels in the neighborhood centered at (i,j). Dilation enlarges bright regions and shrinks dark regions.
trans-unit.target: 形态扩张设置在像素 (i,j) 的最大过在中心附近的所有像素 (i,j) 。扩张扩大了明亮的区域而缩小了黑暗的区域。

trans-unit.source: Morphological erosion sets a pixel at (i,j) to the minimum over all pixels in the neighborhood centered at (i,j). Erosion shrinks bright regions and enlarges dark regions.
trans-unit.target: 形态侵蚀将(i,j)处的像素设置为以(i,j)为中心的邻域内所有像素的最小值。侵蚀缩小了明亮区域,扩大了黑暗区域。

trans-unit.source: Morphological erosion sets a pixel at (i,j) to the minimum over all pixels in the neighborhood centered at (i,j). Erosion shrinks bright regions and enlarges dark regions.
trans-unit.target: 形态学消蚀设置在像素 (i,j) 为最小过在中心附近的所有像素 (i,j) 。侵蚀使明亮的区域收缩，使黑暗的区域扩大。

trans-unit.source: Morphological operations, e.g., opening or skeletonization.
trans-unit.target: 形态上的操作,如开口或镂空。

trans-unit.source: Morphological reconstruction by dilation is similar to basic morphological dilation: high-intensity values will replace nearby low-intensity values. The basic dilation operator, however, uses a structuring element to determine how far a value in the input image can spread. In contrast, reconstruction uses two images: a “seed” image, which specifies the values that spread, and a “mask” image, which gives the maximum allowed value at each pixel. The mask image, like the structuring element, limits the spread of high-intensity values. Reconstruction by erosion is simply the inverse: low-intensity values spread from the seed image and are limited by the mask image, which represents the minimum allowed value.
trans-unit.target: 通过膨胀进行的形态重建与基本形态膨胀相似：高强度值将替代附近的低强度值。但是，基本的膨胀算子使用结构化元素来确定输入图像中的值可以散布到多远。相反，重建使用两个图像：“种子”图像和“蒙版”图像，“种子”图像指定散布的值，而“蒙版”图像给出每个像素的最大允许值。像结构元素一样，蒙版图像会限制高强度值的散布。通过侵蚀进行的重建只是相反的过程：低强度值从种子图像开始扩散，并受蒙版图像限制，而蒙版图像表示最小允许值。

trans-unit.source: Most coins are well segmented out of the background. Small objects from the background can be easily removed using the ndi.label function to remove objects smaller than a small threshold.
trans-unit.target: 大多数硬币都被很好地分割成背景。使用 ndi.label 函数可轻松删除背景中的小对象，以删除小于小阈值的对象。

trans-unit.source: Most notably, if v4, v8, v2, and v6 are all >= level (or any generalization of this case) two parallel planes are generated by this algorithm, separating v4 and v8 from v2 and v6. An equally valid interpretation would be a single connected thin surface enclosing all four points. This is the best known ambiguity, though there are others.
trans-unit.target: 最值得注意的是，如果v4，v8，v2和v6均≥= level （或这种情况的任何概括），则通过此算法生成两个平行平面，将v4和v8与v2和v6分开。同样有效的解释是包围所有四个点的单个连接的薄表面。这是最知名的歧义，尽管还有其他歧义。

trans-unit.source: Multidimensional properties of fixed size for a given image dimension, such as “centroid” (every centroid will have three elements in a 3D image, no matter the region size), will be split into that many columns, with the name {property_name}{separator}{element_num} (for 1D properties), {property_name}{separator}{elem_num0}{separator}{elem_num1} (for 2D properties), and so on.
trans-unit.target: 给定图像尺寸的固定大小的多维属性，例如“质心”（每个质心在3D图像中将具有三个元素，无论区域大小如何），都将被分成许多列，名称为{property_name} {分隔符} {element_num}（用于1D属性），{property_name} {separator} {elem_num0} {separator} {elem_num1}（用于2D属性），依此类推。

trans-unit.source: Next, we want to separate the two circles. We generate markers at the maxima of the distance to the background:
trans-unit.target: 接下来,我们要将两个圆圈分开。我们在与背景距离的最大值处生成标记。
